text: Ani amhi tyanna bara parivarammadhye vibhaguna sarvanci vegavegali jamata tharavuna dili ani amhi musala adesa dila, jevha tyancya samudayacya lokanni pani magitale, ki apali lathi amakya eka dagadavara mara, maga tyaca ksani tyatuna bara srota vahu lagale. Pratyekane apale pani pinyace sthana januna ghetale ani amhi tyancyavara dhaganci savali keli ani tyanna manna ani salva pohacavile ki kha svaccha sud'dha svadista vastu, jya amhi tumhala pradana kelya aheta. Ani tyanni amace kahica nukasana kele nahi, ulata te svatahceca nukasana karita hote
